content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1.0, 1.0) and an inserter that puts iron ore into it
- Stone furnace at position (3.0, 0.0) and an inserter that puts iron ore into it

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough capacity to accept the items before inserting. Check the inventory of the furnace to avoid overloading.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has produced enough output. Check the output inventory of the furnace to ensure there are items available for extraction.

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly refresh the entity data to ensure that you are working with the most current information about the entities on the map. Avoid relying on outdated data for operations.
